2018.title: CRISPR babies
2018.description: The world's first babies with CRISPR-Cas9 (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats)â€“edited genes were born.

2018.title: Genetically modified houseplant cleans indoor air
2018.description: Plants were genetically modified to produce cytochrome P450 2E1 (2E1), a key enzyme in mammals that helps clear toxins from the body.

2018.title: Synthetic T-cells using microfluidics
2018.description: Researchers were able to replicate T cell's shape, size and flexibility, which enable it to perform its basic functions of targeting and homing in on infections.

2018.title: pleuraGoh
2018.description: PleuraGoh is a cost-effective catheter fixation device for reducing iatrogenic injuries and improve reliability of tube-thoracostomy treatment.

2018.title: Aptamer-Based TB Antigen Tests
2018.description: DNA aptamer-based diagnostic tests, ALISA and ECS, have potential utility in active case finding in high-risk groups and screening for pulmonary T
